text: Bran Castle (; ) is a castle near Bran in the area of Bra≈üov, Romania. It is a national monument and landmark in Romania. The fortress lies on the border between Transylvania and Wallachia, on Highway 73. The castle is known as "Dracula's Castle". It was used as the home of Dracula in Bram Stoker's Dracula.
